languages.text: {n}Из темных дыр на лице регента со свистом вылетает воздух. Взгляд выпученных глаз яростно мечется между вами и Кассией.{/n} "В этот раз я вынужден согласиться с тобой, дитя. Однако не забывай о долге — твоя ноша навсегда с тобой. Мы позволяем тебе набраться опыта в компании {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}... Пока что. За сим — мы вынуждены откланяться. Да охранит Император ваш путь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Из темных дыр на лице регента со свистом вылетает воздух. Взгляд выпученных глаз яростно мечется между вами и Кассией.{/n} "В этот раз я вынужден согласиться с тобой, дитя. Однако не забывай о долге — твоя ноша навсегда с тобой. Мы позволяем тебе набраться опыта в компании {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}... Пока что. За сим — мы вынуждены откланяться. Да охранит Император ваш путь".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Air whistles out of the dark holes in the regent's face. His bulging eyes dart furiously between you and Cassia.{/n} "This time we are compelled to agree with you, child. But do not forget your duty — your burden will forever remain with you. We will allow you to gain experience in the company of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... for now. We must now take our leave. May the Emperor watch over your path."
languages.original_text: {n}Из темных дыр на лице регента со свистом вылетает воздух. Взгляд выпученных глаз яростно мечется между вами и Кассией.{/n} "В этот раз я вынужден согласиться с тобой, дитя. Однако не забывай о долге — твоя ноша навсегда с тобой. Мы позволяем тебе набраться опыта в компании {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}... Пока что. За сим — мы вынуждены откланяться. Да охранит Император ваш путь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Air whistles out of the dark holes in the Regent's face. The gaze of his bulging eyes swings violently between you and Cassia.{/n} "This time I have to agree with you, child. But do not forget about your duty — your burden will forever remain with you. We allow you to gain experience in the company of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... For now. We must now take our leave. May the Emperor watch over your path."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}空气发出了呼啸的声音，从摄政王脸上的空洞里汹涌而出。他瞪着眼睛，愤怒地盯着你，随后又盯着卡西娅。{/n}“这次我们不得不同意你的看法，孩子。但不要忘记你的职责，你的负担会永远压在你的肩上。我们允许你陪伴{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}一起旅行，在旅途中获得经验……暂时如此。我们现在必须离开了，愿帝皇指引你的前路。”
languages.original_text: {n}Air whistles out of the dark holes in the regent's face. His bulging eyes dart furiously between you and Cassia.{/n} "This time we are compelled to agree with you, child. But do not forget your duty — your burden will forever remain with you. We will allow you to gain experience in the company of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... for now. We must now take our leave. May the Emperor watch over your path."

traits.locale_text: {n}空气发出了呼啸的声音，从摄政王脸上的空洞里汹涌而出。他瞪着眼睛，愤怒地盯着你，随后又盯着卡西娅。{/n}“这次我们不得不同意你的看法，孩子。但不要忘记你的职责，你的负担会永远压在你的肩上。我们允许你陪伴{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}一起旅行，在旅途中获得经验……暂时如此。我们现在必须离开了，愿帝皇指引你的前路。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}El aire silba al salir por los oscuros agujeros de la cara del regente. Sus ojos, saltones, no dejan de miraros a Cassia y a ti.{/n} «Esta vez me veo obligado a aceptar que tienes razón, pequeña. Pero no olvides tu deber. Permitiremos que acompañes a{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}... por ahora. De momento, debemos irnos. Que el Emperador vele por tu camino».
languages.original_text: {n}Air whistles out of the dark holes in the regent's face. His bulging eyes dart furiously between you and Cassia.{/n} "This time we are compelled to agree with you, child. But do not forget your duty — your burden will forever remain with you. We will allow you to gain experience in the company of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... for now. We must now take our leave. May the Emperor watch over your path."

traits.locale_text: {n}El aire silba al salir por los oscuros agujeros de la cara del regente. Sus ojos, saltones, no dejan de miraros a Cassia y a ti.{/n} «Esta vez me veo obligado a aceptar que tienes razón, pequeña. Pero no olvides tu deber. Permitiremos que acompañes a{mf|l| la} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}... por ahora. De momento, debemos irnos. Que el Emperador vele por tu camino».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}摂政の顔の暗い穴から空気が吹き出す。彼の膨らんだ目が、あなたとカシアの間を激しく行き来する。{/n}「今回はお前に同意せざるを得んな、我が子よ。だが、己の義務を忘れてはならんぞ…その重荷は、永劫にお前が背負っていくのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}のもとで経験を積むことを許可しよう…今のところはな。では、これで皇帝がお前の行く末を見守ってくださらんことを」
languages.original_text: {n}Air whistles out of the dark holes in the regent's face. His bulging eyes dart furiously between you and Cassia.{/n} "This time we are compelled to agree with you, child. But do not forget your duty — your burden will forever remain with you. We will allow you to gain experience in the company of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... for now. We must now take our leave. May the Emperor watch over your path."

traits.locale_text: {n}摂政の顔の暗い穴から空気が吹き出す。彼の膨らんだ目が、あなたとカシアの間を激しく行き来する。{/n}「今回はお前に同意せざるを得んな、我が子よ。だが、己の義務を忘れてはならんぞ…その重荷は、永劫にお前が背負っていくのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}のもとで経験を積むことを許可しよう…今のところはな。では、これで皇帝がお前の行く末を見守ってくださらんことを」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Aus den dunklen Löchern im Gesicht des Regenten entweicht pfeifend Luft. Seine hervortretenden Augen wechseln zwischen dir und Cassia hin und zurück.{/n} "Dieses Mal müssen wir Euch zustimmen, Kind. Aber vergesst Eure Pflicht nicht – Eure Bürde wird Euch für immer begleiten. Wir werden Euch gestatten, in Gesellschaft {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}{/g} Erfahrungen zu sammeln ... für den Moment. Und nun müssen wir gehen. Möge der Imperator über Euren Pfad wachen."
languages.original_text: {n}Air whistles out of the dark holes in the regent's face. His bulging eyes dart furiously between you and Cassia.{/n} "This time we are compelled to agree with you, child. But do not forget your duty — your burden will forever remain with you. We will allow you to gain experience in the company of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... for now. We must now take our leave. May the Emperor watch over your path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aus den dunklen Löchern im Gesicht des Regenten entweicht pfeifend Luft. Seine hervortretenden Augen wechseln zwischen dir und Cassia hin und zurück.{/n} "Dieses Mal müssen wir Euch zustimmen, Kind. Aber vergesst Eure Pflicht nicht – Eure Bürde wird Euch für immer begleiten. Wir werden Euch gestatten, in Gesellschaft {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} Erfahrungen zu sammeln ... für den Moment. Und nun müssen wir gehen. Möge der Imperator über Euren Pfad wachen."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Les yeux exorbités du régent se portent tour à tour sur vous et sur Cassia, tandis que le trou qui lui sert de nez siffle au rythme de sa respiration accélérée.{/n} « Nous n'avons d'autre choix que d'approuver votre choix, Enfant. Mais n'oubliez pas votre devoir, car c'est un fardeau que vous porterez à jamais. Nous vous permettrons donc d'accumuler de l'expérience au côté {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}{/g}... pour le moment. En attendant, il est temps que nous prenions congé. Que l'Empereur veille sur vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Air whistles out of the dark holes in the regent's face. His bulging eyes dart furiously between you and Cassia.{/n} "This time we are compelled to agree with you, child. But do not forget your duty — your burden will forever remain with you. We will allow you to gain experience in the company of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... for now. We must now take our leave. May the Emperor watch over your path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux exorbités du régent se portent tour à tour sur vous et sur Cassia, tandis que le trou qui lui sert de nez siffle au rythme de sa respiration accélérée.{/n} « Nous n'avons d'autre choix que d'approuver votre choix, mon enfant. Mais n'oubliez pas votre devoir, car c'est un fardeau que vous porterez à jamais. Nous vous permettrons donc d'accumuler de l'expérience au côté {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}{/g}... pour le moment. En attendant, il est temps que nous prenions congé. Que l'Empereur veille sur vous. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: {n}Naibin yüzündeki karanlık deliklerdeki hava akımının sesini duyabiliyorsun. Şişmiş gözleri sen ve Cassia arasında öfkeyle gidip geliyor.{/n} "Bu kez seninle aynı fikirde olmak zorundayız çocuğum ama vazifeni unutmayasın. Yükünü her daim omuzlarında taşıyacaksın. Şimdilik sana {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir'e{/g} eşlik ederek deneyim kazanma izni veriyoruz. Artık gitmeliyiz. İmparator, önündeki yolda seni korusun."
languages.original_text: {n}Air whistles out of the dark holes in the regent's face. His bulging eyes dart furiously between you and Cassia.{/n} "This time we are compelled to agree with you, child. But do not forget your duty — your burden will forever remain with you. We will allow you to gain experience in the company of {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}... for now. We must now take our leave. May the Emperor watch over your path."

traits.locale_text: {n}Naibin yüzündeki karanlık deliklerdeki hava akımının sesini duyabiliyorsun. Şişmiş gözleri sen ve Cassia arasında öfkeyle gidip geliyor.{/n} "Bu kez seninle aynı fikirde olmak zorundayız çocuğum ama vazifeni unutma, üzerindeki yük her daim sana ait olacak. Sana {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}'e eşlik ederek deneyim kazanma izni veriyoruz ama yalnızca şimdilik. Artık gitmeliyiz. İmparator önündeki yol boyunca seni korusun."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
